headline: Parts Supplier For 737 Max Plans Layoffs
abstract: Spirit AeroSystems, which supplies the fuselage for the 737 Max, said the layoffs were due to uncertainty around when production will resume.
lead_paragraph: The company that supplies Boeing with the fuselage for its 737 Max jet said Friday that it would lay off around 2,800 employees at a facility in Kansas, as the economic impact of Boeingâ€™s decision to suspend production of the jet ripples through the global aerospace supply chain.
keywords: Boeing 737 Max Groundings and Safety Concerns (2019)
